scenes.background: (Monica) taps her pen on the table, visibly frustrated. (Bob) looks at you expectantly.
scenes.description: 'This isn't just about planning better. We need your help now. Are you really going to leave us hanging?'

options.text: I understand the urgency. Let's try to quickly tackle this together.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency and showed willingness to help, demonstrating good empathy and perception, though your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I can't help right now. Maybe it's time we consider better long-term solutions.
options.analysis: You stood firm on your boundaries and suggested a long-term improvement, showcasing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation to help immediately.

options.text: It's not fair to expect me to drop everything. We need to distribute tasks better.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, which might strain your relationship with colleagues.
